entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Morris
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:04 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing overnight. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
